meanings.definition: The breaking down of tissues in an organism.
meanings.sent1: Histolysis can occur during the body's natural healing process.
meanings.sent2: Histolysis is an important part of the body's ability to regenerate and repair.
meanings.sent3: The histolysis of the damaged tissue was like a team of tiny construction workers dismantling a building.
meanings.sent4: As time passed, the histolysis of the injured area revealed a new layer of healthy tissue underneath.
meanings.sent5: The histolysis of the old scar tissue made way for fresh, pink skin to emerge.

meanings.sent1: Histolysis is a natural response to injury or infection.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study histolysis to understand how diseases affect the body.
meanings.sent3: The histolysis of the overripe fruit in the bowl attracted a swarm of fruit flies.
meanings.sent4: The histolysis of trust between them left only fragments of what once was a strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The histolysis of the ice sculpture under the hot sun was a slow and beautiful transformation.
